title: Pastor Pens Stunning Abortion Article at Start of Trump Admin… Goes MEGA Viral
text:
VIRAL: Hillary Fan Has Screaming Meltdown in Public, Horrifies Helpless Cashier 
“It is illegal to take the life of the unborn if the mother wants the baby, but it is legal to take the life of the unborn if she doesn’t,” wrote Piper, explaining that many states in America treat the killing of an unborn baby as a crime. 
The article also noted how abortionists themselves recognize that they are killing children — yet they seem to think that it is still the right of women to have that done. 
Piper also explained that the limited capacities of a fetus do not “deprive it of personhood.” Being small, not being able to think on your own (yet), relying on your mother for life and being in the womb are all situations that should not disqualify someone from being human. For at least a few of those cases, there are comparable examples in the real world. Is a human adult relying on a respirator and a feeding tube for life really so different from an infant in the womb? 
Piper pointed out how when unborn children are operated on, they are treated as children. However if the mother doesn’t want the children and opts for an abortion, all of a sudden the unborn children aren’t even people anymore — at least in the minds of liberals. 
Piper also noted how the genetic makeup of every human being is unique, even when the child is still in the womb, and after eight weeks all the organs are present in the fetus. 
Perhaps Piper’s most powerful argument was the simplest: “We’ve all seen the photographs” of children in the womb. Advertisement - story continues below
